resources.string: The Galactic Republic is in turmoil. There are protests against the taxation of trade routes to star systems. Hoping to solve the problem with a blockade of deadly cruise ships, the greedy Trade Federation has stopped all shipping to the small planet of Naboo. As the Republic Congress endlessly debates this alarming chain of events, the Supreme Chancellor has secretly dispatched two Jedi Knights, the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy, to resolve the conflict...
